loadingErrorMessage: Failed to load layouts. Please check your layout files and try again.
noTemplateFoundMessage: No valid Template files were discovered. Make sure your layout components export both a default component and a Schema.
modernCompanyDescription: Blue and White Modern Company Profile Presentation
projectReportDescription: A standard template for project reporting
minimalistModernDescription: Cream Maroon Minimalist Modern Geometric Project Presentation
generalDescription: General purpose layouts for common presentation elements
modernDescription: Modern white and blue business pitch deck layouts with clean, professional design
uploadFileDescription: Upload your PDF or PPTX file to extract slides and convert them to a template which you can use to generate AI presentations.
processingTimeWarning: AI template generation can take around 5 minutes per slide. Approximately 1-2 credits will be deducted from your account.
uploadDescription: Select a PDF or PowerPoint file (.pdf or .pptx) to process. Maximum file size: 100MB
clickToUpload: Click to upload a PDF or PPTX file
dragDropOrClickToBrowse: Drag and drop your file here or click to browse
selectPdfOrPptxFileFirst: Select a PDF or PPTX file first
fontManagementDescription: We couldn't load these fonts automatically. Please upload them manually. Make sure the name of the font should be exactly as shown.
enterTemplateNameAndDescription: Enter a name and description for your template. This will help you identify it later.
enterDescription: Enter a description for your template...
describeChanges: Describe the changes you want to make:
enterPrompt: Enter your prompt here... (e.g., 'Change the title color to blue', 'Add a border to the image', etc.)
failedToConvertSlide: Failed to convert slide {{slideNumber}} to HTML
convertHTMLFailed: Failed to convert HTML to React component
selectFileFirst: Please select a PDF or PPTX file first
unsupportedFileType: Unsupported file type. Please upload a PDF or PPTX file.
noSlidesFound: No slides found in the uploaded file
pleaseUploadUnsupportedFonts: Please Upload the not supported fonts, and click Extract Template
allFontsAreSupported: All fonts are supported. Starting template extraction...
unsavedChangesWarning: You have unsaved changes. Are you sure you want to leave?
invalidFileFormat: Invalid file format. Please upload a PDF or PPTX file.
fileSizeExceeded: File size must be less than 100MB
invalidFontFileType: Invalid font file type. Please upload .ttf, .otf, .woff, .woff2, or .eot files
fontFileSizeExceeded: Font file size must be less than 10MB
